definition: bubble/foam/blister (i.e. skin bubble)/to soak/to steep/to infuse/to dawdle/to shilly-shally/to hang about/to pick up (a girl)/to get off with (a sexual partner)/classifier for occurrences of an action/classifier for number of infusions
puffed/swollen/spongy/small lake (esp. in place names)/classifier for urine or feces

sentences.english: Ooplasm was gradually filled up with yolk granules, and the membrane of the germinal vesicle began to disappear.
sentences.chinese: 卵黃球形成逐漸充滿卵質，胚泡膜逐漸消失。

sentences.english: Calcitonin can promote the development and implantation of mouse blastocysts.
sentences.chinese: 探討降鈣素對小鼠胚泡發育及植入的影響。

sentences.english: Its normal reaction depends on the existence of blastocysts in the uteri.
sentences.chinese: 對子宮裏有無胚泡存在的反應也顯然不同。

sentences.english: It suggests that these integrins may take part in the process of implantation in mouse.
sentences.chinese: 提示它們可能參與小鼠胚泡的着牀過程。

sentences.english: To observe the effect of Bushen Huoxue prescription on blastocyst nidation in pregnancy mice.
sentences.chinese: 觀察中藥補腎活血方對妊娠大鼠胚泡着牀率的影響。

sentences.english: In this case, development proceeded apace, resulting in a blastocyst.
sentences.chinese: 這樣以後，迅速發展的結果產生了胚泡。

definition: trophoblastic layer (attaches fertilized ovum to the uterus)/trophoderm
cleavage of fertilized ovum into cells
